original_text: And the king of Ai he hanged on a tree until eventide: and as soon as the sun was down, Joshua commanded that they should take his carcase down from the tree, and cast it at the entering of the gate of the city, and raise thereon a great heap of stones, that remaineth unto this day.
korean_text: 그가 또 아이 왕을 저녁 때까지 나무에 달았다가 해 질 때에 명령하여 그의 시체를 나무에서 내려 그 성문 어귀에 던지고 그 위에 돌로 큰 무더기를 쌓았더니 그것이 오늘까지 있더라

sentences.original_text: And the king of Ai he hanged on a tree
And as soon as the sun was down
Joshua commanded that they should take his carcase down
sentences.korean_translation: 여호수아는 그들이 그의 시체를 내리라고 명령했다

sentences.original_text: and cast it at the entering of the gate of the city
and raise thereon a great heap of stones
sentences.korean_translation: 그 위에 큰 돌무더기를 쌓으라고 했다
